Lehman Uncommon ValuesSirs Please take note of one of Lehman Brothers proudest achievements the Lehman Brothers Uncommon Values Attached is a brief summary of the history of the Product back to As you will see the Lehman has outperformed the SP for the past fifty years There will be more information to come over the course of the next two weeks We feel strongly that the product speaks for itself but would be more than happy to show you more information on this product as it comes to us Please feel free to contact our office here via either phone or email All the best Greg Manning Greg Manning Master Limited PartnershipsDear Sir As you know Lehman Brothers is one of the most prestigious investment banks on Wall Street On a regular basis Lehman brings new companies public in many industries One area that has received great interest lately is Master Limited Partnerships These vehicles generally have high yields in the range with tax advantages In todays environment of low interest rates that is extremely attractive If you would like to learn more the next time we offer one by prospectus please email or call All the best Greg Manning Greg Manning Senior Vice President Lehman Brothers Lehman Brothers Rangers Plus Portfolio of the Ten Largest Market Cap Stocks on the Nasdaq Dear Sir Please take note of this conservative way to invest in the ten largest market capitalization stocks on the Nasdaq Your principle investment will give you protection for up to a drop in each individual name and offer maximum upside potential of for each stock in the basket over a two year time period
